[DQR.IFRS.0102.9542] Equity with a value of 4,358,200,000 is not equal to the combined total of Stockholders Equity Excluding NI and Noncontrolling Interest ( 3,883,000,000 + 4,000,000 ) with a value of 3,887,000,000.
These values should be equal. The properties of this ifrs-full:Equity fact are: Period :2020-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Decimals of Stockholders Equity Including Noncontrolling Interest : 1 Decimals of Stockholders Equity Excluding NI : -6 Decimals of Noncontrolling Interest : -6

These values should be equal. The properties of this ifrs-full:Equity fact are: Period :2019-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Decimals of Stockholders Equity Including Noncontrolling Interest : 1 Decimals of Stockholders Equity Excluding NI : -6 Decimals of Noncontrolling Interest : -6

[DQR.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of 01 - Gewinn (Verlust) but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. ifrs-full:InterestRevenueCalculatedUsingEffectiveInterestMethod, ifrs-full:DepreciationAndAmortisationExpense, ifrs-full:ImpairmentLossImpairmentGainAndReversalOfImpairmentLossDeterminedInAccordanceWithIFRS9, ifrs-full:LossesArisingFromDerecognitionOfFinancialAssetsMeasuredAtAmortisedCost, ifrs-full:GainsArisingFromDerecognitionOfFinancialAssetsMeasuredAtAmortisedCost, bawaggroup:AdministrativeExpenses, ifrs-full:ProfitLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 -

[DQR.IFRS.0129.9606] It is expected that EquityAttributableToOwnersOfParent with a value of 3,883,000,000 reported in the network role http://bawaggroup.com/xbrl/2020/roles/EigenkapitalUndSchulden should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, Equity with the dimension ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis = ifrs-full:EquityAttributableToOwnersOfParentMember and a reported value of 4,353,900,000 multiplied by 1. This value appears in the network role http://bawaggroup.com/xbrl/2020/roles/Eigenkapitalveraenderungsrechnung. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this ifrs-full:EquityAttributableToOwnersOfParent fact are:
Period : 2020-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Decimals of EquityAttributableToOwnersOfParent : -6 Decimals of Equity : 1 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/529900S9YO2JHTIIDG38/2020-12-31/ESEF/AT/0/bawaggroup-2020-12-31.zip/bawaggroup-2020-12-31/reports/bawaggroup-2020-12-31.xhtml 5692
